entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a student who is working on a report for the Department of International Magical Cooperation.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Percy's friend and classmate.

entities.name: department of international magical cooperation
entities.description: The Department of International Magical Cooperation is an organization that deals with international magical issues.

entities.name: cauldron
entities.description: A cauldron is a cooking pot used in magic.

relationships.description: Percy works for the Department of International Magical Cooperation on his report.
Ron reads the Daily Prophet, which is a newspaper that reports on cauldron leaks.
